page.title: 12EVENTS
page.content: {NOTABLE EVENTS} The town of Pershore stages annual events, these are very popular. In June there is one of the most important events in Pershore, it's annual{Pershore Festival. }The Pershore Festival is to let young and old people show their talents in Art, Craft and Music. Many famous performers from all over the world take part. {St Eadburgha's Fair}is on the Abbey Park annually on the 26 June. In July there is an annual six-a-side tournament organized by Pershore United Football Club. This is held at the club ground near the river Avon. May is the month for the {Carnival,}it is always on Bank Holiday Monday. Pershore Carnival is an exciting event with Carnival Queen, procession, fun fair and stalls.
